mapper.insert: insert into test09(no, id, pw, name, email, phone, addr, gender, birth, add_item, agree, private1, private2, marketing, sms, mailing, fourteen_chk, created_date) values(seq_t9.nextval, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{addr}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{add_item}, #{agree}, #{private1}, #{private2}, #{marketing}, #{sms}, #{mailing}, #{fourteen_chk}, sysdate)
